name: H R Computer Solutions
tag_list: bulk-sms, website-development-lucknow, website-development-company, seo-company, web-designing-lucknow, data-recovery, comptuer-amc, bulk-email, short-code, mass-sms
overview:
H.R. Computer Solutions is a Lucknow (India) based Internet and Computer consultancy, specializing in computer services and support, including hardware and software upgrades, virus removal, data recovery, networking and installation of new equipment and systems, Bulk SMS etc.

We also specialize in clean, functional website design, including search engine optimization and database applications, for sites large and small.

Our expertise lies in facilitating creativity with the assistance of technology. We are committed to enhancing the impact of various Online and off-line solutions. Our blend of creativity, technical expertise and best management practices offers a holistic package that places us on an equal footing with any large global player.

Our years of practices have accomplished a concrete system for the web application development process. At any level of project development cycle, it is easy for our team to compile most superior mechanism quickly. It is even easier for our patrons to demand system advancement without testing overhead..

external_links.title: Bulk SMS Service, Website Development Services
